meanings.definition: Any of a large group of volatile unsaturated hydrocarbons found in the essential oils of plants, including many used in flavorings and perfumes.
meanings.sent1: The terpenoids in the lavender oil give it a pleasant scent.
meanings.sent2: Essential oils often contain terpenoids that contribute to their fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The terpenoids in the perfume made the room smell like a garden.
meanings.sent4: The terpenoids danced in the air, creating a symphony of aromas.
meanings.sent5: As I opened the bottle, the terpenoids wafted out, filling the room with a sweet aroma.

meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds derived from terpenes, typically having the formula C10H16.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the structure of terpenoids to understand their properties.
meanings.sent2: Terpenoids are important compounds in the field of organic chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The terpenoids gathered around the terpenes, discussing their chemical bonds.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, terpenoids stand out like shining stars.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the terpenoids appeared like tiny building blocks of nature.
